definition: BRIC/BRICS economic bloc (Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Meeting of BRICS Ministers of Foreign Affairs on the margins of UNGA.
sentences.chinese: 举行金砖国家安全事务高级代表会议。

sentences.english: Fourth, we should endeavor to strengthen the BRICS partnership for common development.
sentences.chinese: 第四，大力加强金砖国家共同发展的伙伴关系。

sentences.english: We believe that the BRICS summit might help China to express itself truly.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信金砖峰会也许将帮助中国真实地表达自己。

sentences.english: We welcome South Africa to attend the BRICS Leaders Meeting as a new member.
sentences.chinese: 我们欢迎南非作为新成员参加金砖国家领导人会晤。

sentences.english: Meeting of BRICS Health Ministers and preparatory meetings.
sentences.chinese: 举行金砖国家卫生部长会议及其筹备会。

sentences.english: Meeting of BRICS Ministers of Science and Technology and meeting of BRICS Senior Officials on Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 举行金砖国家科技部长会和科技高官会议。

sentences.english: Meeting of the BRICS Urbanization Forum.
sentences.chinese: 举行金砖国家城市化论坛。

sentences.english: Update, as appropriate, the Bibliography on the BRICS countries.
sentences.chinese: 适时更新《金砖国家国情书目》。

sentences.english: But the BRIC countries don’t even rank in the top 100 on that measure.
sentences.chinese: 不过金砖四国在这一分项中连前100名都没排进。

sentences.english: The gold bricks he stole from us had a Balinese dancer stamped on them.
sentences.chinese: 他从我们这偷走的金砖上刻着巴厘岛舞娘。

sentences.english: Razov, Russian Ambassador to China said that big differences do not exist between the BRICS countries.
sentences.chinese: 拉佐夫认为，金砖五国间不存在太大分歧。

sentences.english: The leaders of Brazil, Russia, India, and China -- a group known as the BRIC countries -- gathered for their first formal summit in the Russian city of Yekaterinburg.
sentences.chinese: “金砖四国”领导人在俄罗斯叶卡捷琳堡峰会上合影。

sentences.english: Yet can they save us from worldwide economic stagnation?
sentences.chinese: 但金砖五国能使我们脱离全球经济停滞状态吗？

sentences.english: And, in some ways, Brazil outclasses the other BRICs.
sentences.chinese: 在某些方面，巴西要大大超过金砖四国的其他成员。

sentences.english: There's little reason to doubt the growth potential of the BRICs.
sentences.chinese: 基本没有什么理由去质疑金砖四国的增长潜力。

definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
Yuanbao district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning
a silver or gold ingot/mock ingot (burnt as offering in worship)/a name for ancient currency/a rare genius
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
